import pandas as pd
df_raw = spark.read.parquet(
    "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/staging/sweden_medical.parquet",
    header=True, inferSchema=True
)
# convert to pandas
df = df_raw.toPandas()

# keep only the columns we care about
df_long = df[['ar', 'kon_label', 'atc','antal_expedieringar', 'antal_patienter']]

# sort based on time, gender, drug
df_long = df_long.sort_values(by=['ar', 'atc']).reset_index(drop=True)

#Change column names to our standardized names
df_long = df_long.rename(columns={
    'ar': 'year', 
'kon_label': 'sex', 
'atc':'atc_level_5', 
'antal_expedierinagr': 'expedited_ddd', 
'antal_patienter': 'users'
})

#Change Male and Female to M and F
df_long['sex'] = df_long['sex'].replace({
    'K': 'F'
})
df_long.head(30)

# Summera per år, kön, ATC
df_grouped = (
    df_long
    .groupby(["year", "sex", "atc_level_5"], as_index=False)
    [["antal_expedieringar", "users"]]
    .sum()
    .sort_values(["year", "atc_level_5"])
    .reset_index(drop=True)
)

# Visa de första 30 raderna
df_grouped.head(30)

# Summera per år, kön, ATC
df_grouped = (
    df_long
    .groupby(["year", "sex", "atc_level_5"], as_index=False)
    [["antal_expedieringar", "users"]]
    .sum()
    .assign(sex_order=lambda d: d["sex"].map({"M": 0, "F": 1}))
    .sort_values(["year", "atc_level_5", "sex_order"])
    .drop(columns="sex_order")
    .reset_index(drop=True)
)

# Visa de första 30 raderna
df_grouped.head(30)

print("Antal rader i df_long:", len(df_long))
print("Kolumner:", df_long.columns.tolist())
df_long.head(10)   # visar de 10 första raderna

# Aggregera till en rad per (year, sex, atc_level_5)
df_agg = (
    df_long
      .groupby(["year","sex","atc_level_5"], as_index=False)[["antal_expedieringar","users"]]
      .sum()
      .assign(sex_order=lambda d: d["sex"].map({"M":0,"F":1}))
      .sort_values(["year","atc_level_5","sex_order"])
      .drop(columns="sex_order")
      .reset_index(drop=True)
)

print("Rader före (df_long):", len(df_long))
print("Rader efter agg (df_agg):", len(df_agg))
print("Unika år:", df_agg["year"].nunique(),
      "| Unika ATC:", df_agg["atc_level_5"].nunique(),
      "| Kön:", df_agg["sex"].nunique())

# Säkerställ att inga logiska dubletter finns kvar
print("Logiska dubletter kvar:", df_agg.duplicated(subset=["year","sex","atc_level_5"]).sum())

# Titta snabbt
df_agg.head(1300)

dups = df_agg.duplicated(subset=["year", "sex", "atc_level_5"]).sum()
print("Antal dubletter (ska vara 0):", dups)

import numpy as np
expected_years = set(np.arange(2006, 2025))
missing_years = expected_years - set(df_agg["year"])
print("Saknade år:", missing_years if missing_years else "Inga")

atc_sex = df_agg.groupby("atc_level_5")["sex"].nunique()
print("ATC-koder som bara har ett kön:", atc_sex[atc_sex == 1].index.tolist())

# Spark-DF
spark_df = spark.createDataFrame(df_agg)   

# Path till standardized-mapp
output_path = "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/sweden_medicine.parquet"

# Spara 
spark_df.write.mode("overwrite").parquet(output_path)

print(f" Standardized-data sparad till {output_path}")

import pandas as pd

# Läs standardized parquet (från staging eller befintlig standardize)
df_std = spark.read.parquet(
    "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/sweden_medicine.parquet"
).toPandas()

# Summera över båda könen
df_both = (
    df_std
    .groupby(["year", "atc_level_5"], as_index=False)
    [["antal_expedieringar", "users"]]
    .sum()
)

# Lägg till kolumn sex = "Båda könen"
df_both["sex"] = "Båda könen"

# Anpassa kolumnordningen
df_both = df_both[["year", "sex", "atc_level_5", "antal_expedieringar", "users"]]

# Kontroll
print("Antal rader efter summering:", len(df_both))
print("Könskategorier:", df_both["sex"].unique())

# Förhandsvisa
df_both.head(20)

import pandas as pd

# Läs standardized parquet
df_std = spark.read.parquet(
    "abfss://group3fpfilesystem@group3fpadls.dfs.core.windows.net/standardized/sweden_medicine.parquet"
).toPandas()

# Summera över båda könen (slå ihop M + F)
df_no_sex = (
    df_std
    .groupby(["year", "atc_level_5"], as_index=False)
    [["antal_expedieringar", "users"]]
    .sum()
)

# Kontroll
print("Antal rader efter summering:", len(df_no_sex))
print("Kolumner:", df_no_sex.columns.tolist())
print(df_no_sex.count())
# Förhandsvisa
df_no_sex.head(670)
